about_the_game:
Fallen Slayers is an action roguelite where you play as a fallen hero who sold your soul to the dark gods in exchange for power and fame. Now you must do their bidding and unleash the apocalypse unto mankind. Through combinations of each fallen soul, dark god, and biding pact you can explore a tremendous amount of possibilities each time you invade a city in the world of the living.

Features

The main game loop consists in the following features:
  • Choose a fallen soul with specific stats and a unique main weapon.
  • Combine said soul with a dark god, bringing passive and active abilities unique of that god, as well as modifications to your soul's stats.
  • Finish it with a unique dark pact that grants a unique ability in exchange of a price, a curse, or something that may hinder your gameplay as well.
  • Invade a city filled with an army of enemies, each with their own tactic and behaviour to defeat you, and kill their leader.
  • Complete quests and delve into metaprogression systems specifics to strenghten a god or a soul of your preference, as well as unlock more gods, souls and pacts to combine. It's theorycrafting on dark steroids.

    Become the ultimate Fallen Slayer and leave no Survivors.
